name: Caveman Boy
description:
Fight against the Ice Age in this short but challenging platformer! Throw rocks, cook food and brave the wilds!

Z - Jump
X - Bash/Throw
Spacebar - Cook (requires 5 meat and 1 herb)
Left/Right Arrows - Move
Down Arrow - Pickup Rocks/Other objects

Made by:

Code/Art by [noblelemon] - @thenoblestlemon on Twitter

Music/SFX by Voltz Supreme - www.voltzsupreme.com

OST
https://voltzsupreme.bandcamp.com/album/caveman-boy-video-game-soundtrack

UNGA BUNGA !!!

hotfix: https://noblelemon.itch.io/caveman-boy-hotfix/download/qSOF2s6Jb7c6RN5niogMi9vX6zqqZ93F2D4_YGSC

The hotfix moves the HUD so you should be able to see it no matter what now. Additionally, you can now press F2 to restart the game and Page Up/Page Down will allow you to cycle between stages (good for those who are looking for a tour!),
